scripts.start:sync: npx shx rm -rf game && npx shx cp -r ../game . && electron .
scripts.minify: npx shx rm -rf game && npx shx cp -r ../game . && npx terser game/script.js -o game/script.js --compress --mangle --format comments=false
scripts.build-mac: npx shx rm -rf game && npx shx cp -r ../game . && electron-builder --mac
scripts.build-win: npx shx rm -rf game && npx shx cp -r ../game . && electron-builder --win
scripts.build-linux: npx shx rm -rf game && npx shx cp -r ../game . && electron-builder --linux
scripts.build-all: npx shx rm -rf game && npx shx cp -r ../game . && electron-builder --mac --win --linux
scripts.build-steam: npx shx rm -rf game && npx shx cp -r ../game . && npx terser game/script.js -o game/script.js --compress --mangle --format comments=false && electron-builder --mac --win && npx shx cp -r dist/mac-universal/*.app ../../WordyWeapon-Builds/steam/ && npx shx cp -r dist/win-unpacked ../../WordyWeapon-Builds/steam/
scripts.build-demo: npx shx rm -rf game && npx shx cp -r ../game . && electron-builder --mac --win --linux && npx shx mkdir -p ../../WordyWeapon-Builds/demo/mac && npx shx mkdir -p ../../WordyWeapon-Builds/demo/win && npx shx mkdir -p ../../WordyWeapon-Builds/demo/linux && npx shx cp -r dist/mac-universal/*.app ../../WordyWeapon-Builds/demo/mac/ && npx shx cp -r dist/win-unpacked/* ../../WordyWeapon-Builds/demo/win/ && npx shx cp -r dist/linux-unpacked/* ../../WordyWeapon-Builds/demo/linux/
scripts.build-itch: npx shx rm -rf game && npx shx cp -r ../game . && npx shx cp -r game/* ../../WordyWeapon-Builds/itch/
